nodes.text: The IDCA-22 datapad was a rugged model of datapad produced by MerenData. The IDCA-22 was black in color, with a white trim and red labelling. It consisted of a rectangular body with a screen on the right hand side and two silver dials and a input point on the left. Two buttons also sat above the screen along the top border of the datapad. IDCA-22s were used by Imperial Emigration Officers to connect to the Imperial Enforcement DataCore.
